mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_log(id, log_name, create_date, userid, format, normal_log_id, state, isshared, merge_relation, case_number, event_number, per_event_incase, event_names, operator_names) VALUES (#{id}, #{logName}, #{createDate}, #{userId}, #{format}, #{normalLogId}, #{state}, #{isShared}, #{mergeRelation}, #{caseNumber}, #{eventNumber}, #{perEventInCase}, #{eventNames}, #{operatorNames})
